mapper.sql: stock.id as id , stock.store_id as storeId , stock.stock_ground_id as stockGroundId , stock.goods_sale_id as goodsSaleId , stock.goods_id as goodsId , stock.stock_num as stockNum , stock.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , stock.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , stock.is_delete as isDelete , stock.creator_id as creatorId , stock.create_time as createTime , stock.updator_id as updatorId , stock.update_time as updateTime , stock.remark1 as remark1 , stock.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into stock_tb
id,
store_id,
stock_ground_id,
goods_sale_id,
goods_id,
stock_num,
directly_org_id,
hierarchy_id,
is_delete,
creator_id,
create_time,
updator_id,
update_time,
remark1,
remark2,
#{id},
#{storeId},
#{stockGroundId},
#{goodsSaleId},
#{goodsId},
#{stockNum},
#{directlyOrgId},
#{hierarchyId},
#{isDelete},
#{creatorId},

mapper.update:
update stock_tb
store_id = #{storeId},
stock_ground_id = #{stockGroundId},
goods_sale_id = #{goodsSaleId},
goods_id = #{goodsId},
stock_num = #{stockNum},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
